Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
Another program is using {0}.
Please close any programs using this file and try again.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter the text to display for the hyperlink.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a valid hyperlink.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
The blog theme couldn't be downloaded.
You will be able to post to this blog, but you won't be able to see the blog theme while editing posts.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
The temporary post that was created to retrieve the theme for your blog wasn't deleted.
Please delete this temporary post from your blog.

Message.Title: Download Blog Theme
Message.Text:
Would you like to download the blog theme by publishing a temporary post? The post will be removed immediately after your theme is retrieved.
This will let you see what your posts will look like online while you are editing.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The title for the post is too long. Please make the title shorter and try publishing the post again.
Message.comment:Text: Body of error message that is displayed when post title is too long.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
A problem occurred while detecting blog settings:
{0}

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
The user name or password is incorrect.
Please try again.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Open Live Writer
Message.Text: You signed in successfully with a blog account, but you do not have a blog with this service provider. $#xA;Check with the blog service provider and then try again.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.comment:Text: {0} - The URL that was not found

Message.Title: Find
Message.Text: Finished searching the document.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Can't insert a hyperlink for this selection. Select text or click a picture and then try again.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Can't insert a hyperlink in the post title. Select different text and then try again.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Paste special can only be used with HTML and text data. Select different text and then try again

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Are you sure that you want to delete this auto-link entry?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Are you sure that you want to delete this auto-replace entry?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Are you sure you want to replace the current entry for that text?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
Found the same link text "{0}" and URL {1}.
Do you want to use this link information?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Select a link.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Are you sure you want to remove this blog from Writer?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: If you choose to upload pictures to an FTP site, specify the settings for the destination server.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: A problem occurred while trying to connect to the remote server.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The remote server could not be contacted to verify the settings. Do you want to continue anyway?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter the web address for your blog home page.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a valid web address for your blog home page.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a host name to continue.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
{0} was not able to log in to the remote server using the username and password.
Please check that the information is correct and try again.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
{0} encountered a problem while signing in:
{1}

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The URL mapping could not be verified. Do you want to continue anyway?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a value for the {0} field in order to configure blog publishing.
Message.comment:Text: {0} - The name of the missing field

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
An unexpected error occurred while trying to log in to the server.
If you have a proxy or firewall configured, please make sure your system is properly configured to allow this program to connect to the remote server.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a URL mapping to continue.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a username and password to continue.

Message.Title: Confirm Delete
Message.Text:
The {0} will be deleted both from your blog and from the local machine.
Are you sure you want to delete the {0} "{1}"?
Message.comment:Text: {0} - either post or page, {1} - post/page title

Message.Title: Confirm Delete
Message.Text: Are you sure you want to delete the draft {0} "{1}"?
Message.comment:Text: {0} - either post or page, {1} - post/page title

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: An internal error occurred (incompatible blog post info type). Unable to open the selected post.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The file {0} is not recognized as a valid image file.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Select a post to open before proceeding.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The posts on this blog must have a title. Type a title for your post, and try publishing it again.

Message.Title: Plug-in Status
Message.Text: You have chosen to enable or disable plug-ins. For these changes to take effect you need to restart Writer.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The specified post file ({0}) is not a valid blog post so it could not be opened.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The specified post file ({0}) does not exist.

Message.Title: Generate Authoring Template
Message.Text: Would you like to generate an authoring template that matches the theme of your blog?

Message.Title: Post Entry as Draft
Message.Text:
The blog entry you are editing has not been posted.
Do you want to post a draft of the entry now?

Message.Title: Publish Entry
Message.Text:
You have posted this blog entry as a draft.
Do you want to publish it now?

Message.Title: Save Changes
Message.Text:
There are unsaved changes to this post.
Do you want to save the changes before proceeding?

Message.Title: Spell Check Canceled
Message.Text:
The spell check was not completed.
Do you still want to publish this post?
The spell check is complete.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
You have not added tags to this post.
Do you still want to continue with publishing?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Select a picture.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a correctly formatted URL.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Preview is currently unavailable. Please check the entered URL and your network connection.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
You have not specified categories for this post.
Do you still want to continue with publishing?

Message.Title: Confirm Delete
Message.Text: Are you sure you want to delete the table?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a valid value for the {0} field.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a value less than {0} for the {1} field.
Message.comment:Text: {0} - a number, {1} - the name of a field

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a value of at least {0} for the {1} field.
Message.comment:Text: {0} - a number, {1} - the name of a field

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Unable to establish a connection with the FTP server.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The specified hostname does not appear to be running an FTP server.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The specified hostname does not exist.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
The specified publish folder does not exist:
{0}

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: A publishing error occurred: {0}

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Specify a location.
The web address you entered to ping is invalid.
To enable pings, provide at least one valid web address.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Unable to display content because there is no Internet connection available.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The blog server is not configured to accept multiple post categories.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Can't insert {0} at this location. Click another location in your post and try inserting it again.
Message.comment:Text: {0} - an object to be inserted (image, tags, map, etc.)

Message.Text:
Warning: The bitmap for plug-in {0} could not be loaded from the specified path ({1}).
Note: You should ensure that your plug-in class is contained within the default namespace of the assembly.
Message.comment:Text: {0} - plug-in name, {1} - a resource path (the plug-in author will know what this means, and only plug-in authors should see this error message)

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.comment:Text: {0} - plug-in name, {1} - parameter name, {2} - error message

Message.Title: Open Live Writer

Message.Text:
Unable to retrieve the {0} from the blog service.
Your blog service could not process the request due to a network or server error.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a name for this provider.
Enter a HTML template for each tag.
The HTML Caption must contain the token '{0}'.

Message.Title: Confirm Delete
Message.Text: Are you sure you'd like to delete '{0}'?
Message.comment:Text: {0} - the name of the provider that is about to be deleted

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Select a tag provider to continue.

Are you sure you'd like to restore the default providers?
Restoring will add any missing default providers and will overwrite any changes that you've made to the existing default providers. It will not overwrite or delete any new providers that you've created.
Message.Title: Confirm Restore Default
Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Connect to the Internet to insert and edit maps.

Unable to validate that the pushpin URL you entered points to a valid image file on the web. Note that the URL may still be correct; however, it could not be located at this time.
Do you still want to set this as your custom pushpin URL?

The post file "{0}" is marked read-only.
Save the post file into a writable location prior to opening it.
Message.comment:Text: {0} - the file name of the post file
Message.Title: Open Live Writer

Message.Text: The server did not respond with the expected authorization token.

Blogger returned the following error:
{0}

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Sign in to Google Blogger to continue.

An unexpected error has occurred while attempting to log in:
{0}

Message.Title: Confirm Delete
Message.Text:
An error occurred while attempting to delete the {0} on your blog.
Do you still wish to delete the local copy of the {0}?
{0} is not a valid URL.
Message.comment:Text: {0} - directory or file path, URL, etc

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The current blog does not support Post as Draft for previously published posts.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The information entered cannot be matched to a recognized video provider. Please enter a valid URL or embed code.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The selected video publisher failed for an unknown reason to publish the video.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The selected video could not be accessed from the service due to heavy service usage. Please try again.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
Error accessing video {0}
The video could not be previewed as a result of this error.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Select a video to insert.

Message.Title: Picasa Web Albums
Message.Text:
In order to upload pictures to Blogger blogs, go to the Picasa Web Albums homepage, sign in with your Blogger account, and agree to the Terms and Conditions.
Would you like to go to the Picasa Web Albums homepage now?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text:
To upload videos to YouTube, link a YouTube nickname with the account {0}.
Would you like launch a browser to link your account now?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a Microsoft Account ID and password to continue.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Sign in and select a video to continue.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: To configure {0} to publish to WordPress, enter your blog's homepage URL (e.g. http://myblog.wordpress.com).
Message.comment:Text: {0} = will be replaced with Open Live Writer product name

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The selection contains multiple links, select one to edit.

Message.Title: Confirm Overwrite
Message.Text:
According to the server, this post has been modified since you started editing it.
Do you want to overwrite those changes with your own?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a number that is greater than zero.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a number that is zero or greater.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter at least one tag.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a phrase that should be replaced.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a replacement value.

Message.Title: Overwrite Existing Phrase
Message.Text: This phrase is already in the Auto Replace list. Would you like to overwrite the existing phrase?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: No updates are currently available.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Publishing was canceled by the {0} plug-in.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The plug-in {0} generated invalid HTML, which will be discarded in order to avoid damaging your post.

Message.Title: New Plug-in Detected
Message.Text:
Do you want to enable the {0} plug-in for this blog?
(You can change this setting later; under the Blog menu, click Edit Blog Settings and then Plug-ins.)

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: To publish the video, accept the service Terms of Use and Safety Tips. Follow the links to read them, and check the box if you agree.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: One or more videos failed to publish. Remove the failed video and try again.

Message.Text: All fields are required for video publish. Verify that all fields have been entered.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: The path to the video file is not valid. Verify the file is present on disk.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Using Open Live Writer from the guest account is not supported.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: A problem occurred while retrieving videos. Please try again.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: This account is not part of the Beta program. Try again with an account that has been authorized.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.comment:Text: {0} - name of a file that could not be found

Message.Title: Open Live Writer

Message.Text: This is not a valid location to insert content

Message.Text: Enter a width and height.

Message.Title: Discard Changes
Message.Text: Are you sure you want to permanently discard the recovered changes?

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Could not access: {0}
Message.comment:Text: {0} - the folder path Open Live Writer is trying to access.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Could not access your Documents folder.
Message.comment:Text: {0} - the folder path Open Live Writer is trying to create.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Enter a valid web address for your blog home page ({0} was not recognized as a valid web address.)

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Posts can no longer be published to blogs on Windows Live Spaces. Go and sign in to http://spaces.live.com to learn more about how you can move your blog to WordPress.com.

Message.Title: Open Live Writer
Message.Text: Open Live Writer can't start because a necessary file is missing or corrupt. To fix this problem, in the Control Panel, please go to Programs and Features and repair Open Live Writer.
